bug.author: ygoncharov
bug.summary: SpaceToDepth for DT_HALF is not supported on GPU
bug.description: space_to_depth can be placed on GPU for float32, but there is no a GPU kernel for float16

comments.comment: Added a PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/14872>#14872</denchmark-link> for DT_HALF support on GPU.
